title: Farrow Bay: Memoirs of a Tormented Mind
description: Simon finds himself on the edge of ending his life as he continues to mourn the death of his father. However, when a package arrives at Simon's doorstep with a message written in his father's handwriting urging him to visit him in the town of Farrow Bay, Simon begins a deeply psychological journey as he ventures into the mysterious town, unknowing of the horrors that await him.Farrow Memories of a Tormented Mind explores abuse, trauma, depression and mental health in a honest and visceral way, as well as providing a unsettling horror experience that will stick with you well after reading.Cover art by Kimber Mclaughlin
author: Christian Cryers
